original_text: And he said, Wherefore doth my lord thus pursue after his servant? for what have I done? or what evil is in mine hand?
korean_text: 또 이르되 내 주는 어찌하여 주의 종을 쫓으시나이까 내가 무엇을 하였으며 내 손에 무슨 악이 있나이까

sentences.original_text: Wherefore doth my lord thus pursue after his servant?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 나의 주께서 자기 종을 이렇게 쫓으십니까?

sentences.original_text: or what evil is in mine hand?
